node.html:
• Built and maintained Power BI dashboards used by cross-functional teams.
  • Wrote optimized SQL queries and stored procedures for reporting and analytics.
  • Developed SSIS ETL pipelines integrating SQL Server, Excel, and API data.
  • Improved reporting accuracy and refresh reliability through data validation.

• Worked on biomedical informatics projects involving EHR systems and clinical decision support (CDSS).
  • Performed EHR chart review, vitals interpretation, and clinical documentation aligned with SAFER guidelines.
  • Analyzed CDSS alerts and alert fatigue to identify workflow optimization opportunities.
  • Studied Epic EHR systems for research data, quality reporting, and population health analytics.

• Designed Power BI data models and DAX measures for scalable dashboards.
  • Created reusable SQL views and stored procedures for KPI reporting.
  • Partnered with stakeholders to translate business needs into analytics solutions.

• Supported healthcare and research data workflows, including data cleaning, analysis, and documentation.
  • Contributed to reproductive-health research and diagnostic device development, including point-of-care and smartphone-based analysis.
  • Developed deep learning (CNN) models to improve diagnostic accuracy and automate imaging workflows.
  • Applied microfluidics, imaging, and prototype testing to support study design, validation, and research reporting.
